name: Scream of the Viking REDUX
detailed_description:
Scream of the Viking REDUX - is the final part of that hardcore platformer with surviving elements where you are going to do lots of various levels for the Viking. In this game you have to collect all arrows on the level and after that the door to the Viking’s hut will open. You will enter the door and be on the next level. This rule works in every part of the game.

But it isn’t easy to do it because on your way to the success you will bump into lots of traps like sharp pikes, dangerous plants and so on. If you suddenly die, you can start the level again and try to finish it. Don’t be scared and good luck!
